response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge. The next step is to take the pie out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Open the oven.
(7) Put the pie in the oven.
(8) Close the oven.
(9) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take the pie out of the fridge
    cheese_tart = registry(env, "cheese_tart_188")
    EasyGrasp(robot, cheese_tart)
    donothing(env)
